title: LF JG/SUP AND TOP
body: Need a support or jgler and a top laner - Add me

replies.body:
I play all 3 roles
More comfortable picks (In no particular order) below
Top: Darius/Fiora/Garen/Maokai/Teemo/Nasus
Jungle: Rammus/Lee Sin/Camille/Shyvana/Xin Zhao
Support: Thresh/Blitzcrank/Leona/Pyke
I can play all 3 role but I prefer jungle
